title: Movin' Out Moving
description: This is a simple site my friend asked me to put together for his new business.  He mostly wanted a place to list out his services and simple means of communication that he can be reached at.

title: Omelette Recipe Page
description: Fun little project that I got from Front End Mentor.  The project was to build a recipe page from scratch.  I was able to accomplish this with ease as I mostly did it to learn the platform.

title: FAQ Accordion Card
description: My second projectsfrom Front End Mentor.  In this project, I was instructed to build an FAQ accordian page.  Copy and mockup provided.  I did get a little hung up on the accordian functionality as I typically use bootstrap for such a feature.

title: Porfolio Site 2.0
description: The current site you're on!  This site is a combination of most of the skills I've learned over the last 5 years.  This site is built using Astro, which is a JavaScript frame work that handles both front-end and back-end.  I designed everything myself (with some slight inpiration from sites I found in my research phase).

title: YouTube Playlist Maker
description: This was my very first projects using Svelte and had a lot of fun using it!  You can paste multiple links into the text area, then generate a list of YouTube videos which can be played directly on the site.
